branding.tagline: Get access to Spotify Premium for life with a one time payment.

deliveryInstructions: You will receive an upgrade key in your email. Copy this key and paste it in Step 2 below.

features.title: Instant Activation
features.description: Get Premium access within 5-10 minutes of submission

features.title: Secure Service
features.description: Bank-level encryption and secure payment processing

features.title: 24/7 Support
features.description: Round-the-clock customer support for all your needs

features.title: Free Replacements
features.description: Unlimited free replacements if any issues occur

features.title: No Ads
features.description: Enjoy uninterrupted music without any advertisements

features.title: Offline Listening
features.description: Download and listen to your favorite tracks offline

features.title: Unlimited Skips
features.description: Skip as many songs as you want, anytime

features.title: High Quality Audio
features.description: Stream in high-quality audio up to 320kbps

packages.name: Single Key Package
